dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, Powell just, uh, basically told everyone inflation isn't a problem, right? Is he even, I mean, is he being honest with us?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, Powell just, uh, basically told everyone inflation isn't a problem, right? Is he even, I mean, is he being honest with us?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Originally down in early morning trading, stocks surged after Fed Chair Powell downplayed inflation concerns before the House Financial Services Committee on Wednesday, saying that it may take the U.S. more than three years to reach a key inflation target.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Like, he totally downplayed it, said it'd take three years to hit the target!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Like, he totally downplayed it, said it'd take three years to hit the target!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Originally down in early morning trading, stocks surged after Fed Chair Powell downplayed inflation concerns before the House Financial Services Committee on Wednesday, saying that it may take the U.S. more than three years to reach a key inflation target.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And then, uh, they're injecting another $500 billion! I mean, is this even real money?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then, uh, they're injecting another five hundred dollars billion! I mean, is this even real money?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And the market just soared on it! The Dow, like, up 420 points, the S&P, Nasdaq, all climbing!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And the market just soared on it! The Dow, like, up four hundred twenty points, the S&P, Nasdaq, all climbing!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Dow Jones industrial average soared 420 points, or 1.4%, Wednesday, while the S&P 500, which broke a five-day losing streak on Tuesday, and the tech-heavy Nasdaq climbed 1.1% and 1%, respectively.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But like, tech was kinda mixed, right? Apple, Amazon, Facebook, they all fell close to 1%.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But like, tech was kinda mixed, right? Apple, Amazon, Facebook, they all fell close to one percent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Technology stocks, on the other hand, continued to slip: Apple, Amazon and Facebook all fell close to 1% Wednesday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but Fisker, though! Up nearly 40%! That Foxconn deal is, uh, wild!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but Fisker, though! Up nearly forty percent! That Foxconn deal is, uh, wild!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Elsewhere in the market, Tesla rival Fisker Inc. soared nearly 40%, surpassing a record high from November, after announcing a collaboration with Taiwanese manufacturer Foxconn on a new electric vehicle project.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wild, yes! But then you have Square, right? Sank 7% after, like, buying more Bitcoin!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild, yes! But then you have Square, right? Sank seven percent after, like, buying more Bitcoin!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shares of payments fintech Square, meanwhile, sank about 7% after the firm disclosed in a better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings report that it has doubled down on a $50 million bitcoin investment from October, purchasing $170 million more of the worlds largest cryptocurrency since.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And MicroStrategy, um, they just spent a billion on more Bitcoin too!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And MicroStrategy, um, they just spent a billion on more Bitcoin too!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Publicly traded MicroStrategy, one of the largest corporate bitcoin investors, said Wednesday morning it spent approximately $1 billion to acquire 19,452 more bitcoin tokens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A billion! While it was down! What is even going on?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A billion! While it was down! What is even going on?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The firm purchased while prices were down nearly 10% from a record high of $58,000 earlier this week.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's just, uh, so choppy, you know? Like Erlam said, investors are totally fretting about inflation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just, uh, so choppy, you know? Like Erlam said, investors are totally fretting about inflation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Were going through a very choppy period in the markets, with investors uncertain how to read the movements were seeing in bond markets, Oanda Senior Market Analyst Craig Erlam said Wednesday morning. The curve is steepening, and investors are fretting a little about the prospect of higher inflation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And those Treasury yields, they shot up 50 basis points! That usually, like, spooks stocks, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And those Treasury yields, they shot up fifty basis points! That usually, like, spooks stocks, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Yields on the ten-year Treasurywhich moves inversely to stocksrose 50 basis points Wednesday morning to 1.4%, tacking on to their highest level since last February following congressional testimony from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, who insisted Tuesday that monetary policy would remain accommodative despite inflationary concerns.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! But Powell's just, uh, 'monetary policy will remain accommodative!'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! But Powell's just, uh, 'monetary policy will remain accommodative!'
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Yields on the ten-year Treasurywhich moves inversely to stocksrose 50 basis points Wednesday morning to 1.4%, tacking on to their highest level since last February following congressional testimony from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, who insisted Tuesday that monetary policy would remain accommodative despite inflationary concerns.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So he's just, like, hoping for the best, uh, and pumping more cash?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So he's just, like, hoping for the best, uh, and pumping more cash?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! And the market's, like, totally eating it up for now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! And the market's, like, totally eating it up for now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: For now, yes. It feels like, uh, we're in for a jumpy year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For now, yes. It feels like, uh, we're in for a jumpy year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This may make for a jumpy year in the markets, with any signs of inflation seeing jitters quickly return and any rallies to stall, just as were experiencing at the moment, he notes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely! Just a real roller coaster.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely! Just a real roller coaster.
